snippet: Fish, a wild-card entrant playing in the next-to-last tournament of his career, opened with a convincing upset of Viktor Troicki in the first round of the Western & Southern Open.
abstract: Wild-card entrant Mardy Fish beats Viktor Troicki in first round of Western & Southern Open tennis tournament in Mason, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Fish, a wild-card entrant playing in the next-to-last tournament of his career, opened with a convincing upset of Viktor Troicki in the first round of the Western & Southern Open.
